scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.migrate: docker-compose exec api npm run migrate || node scripts/migrate.js up
scripts.migrate:undo: docker-compose exec api npm run migrate:undo || node scripts/migrate.js undo
scripts.migrate:status: docker-compose exec api npm run migrate:status || node scripts/migrate.js status
scripts.backup: docker-compose exec postgres pg_dump -U postgres perspec > backups/perspec_backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql || node scripts/backup.js
